mapper.select: SELECT correctness, used_memory as usedMemory, running_time as runningTime, applicant_id as applicantId, test_case_id as testCaseId FROM result

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.select: SELECT correctness, used_memory as usedMemory, running_time as runningTime, applicant_id as applicantId, test_case_id as testCaseId FROM result WHERE applicant_id=#{applicantId} and test_case_id=#{testCaseId}
